OOC:  My last post for Surgital was having him leave and head back to the D=
ecepticon base...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, November 02, 2001 9:13 AM
  Subjec=
t: Re: Another female loseing her mind.


  OOC:  My 
     This is the last=
 post I can find for the mind battle. I'm not sure if I responded or not so=
 I'll play it from here.


    Surgital tried to fight Ice's mind lock on h=
is.  He was down on his knees, which made small craters in the ground, and =
holding his fists, trying to shake it off.  

    Ice fealt satisfaction in=
 her latest acomplishment. It wasn't every day a single bot forces a gestau=
lt to it's knees. mentally she tried to reach out to any Maximal that could=
 hear her thoughts. The mutant forced herself through the pain and tried to=
 direct the order to attack while the giant was down. When this battle was =
over she knew she'd need either an asprin or a labotamy to stop the pain.
 =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, October 12, 2001 12:57 PM
      Subje=
ct: Another female loseing her mind.


      Surgitals flashback was sent i=
nto Ices mind, she saw everything as if it was happening to her. "It's not =
happening to me, it's not me." she kept telling herself as blade after blad=
e struck her mental form. Trying desperately to control her thoughts she sh=
outed another command. "SEPERATE"

      Her owl form spun out of control a=
s she hit the ground. Seeing that form cut and beaten she transformed to he=
r mutant robot mode. Her bearlike paws covered her head as a migrane began =
to form. She tried to be the good leader but her sanity would soon fade if =
her mind didn't leave Surgital. 
        ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
    From: Samir Duran 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Tu=
esday, October 09, 2001 4:15 PM
        Subject: The Cybers Will Never Rule=
 since Tankor sucks when it comes to spelling and using capitals


        =
::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Jume/Whee/Surgital::

        Triggerhappy's finge=
r moved to pull the trigger.  Hell Drak's eyes were closed tight, waiting f=
or death.  But nothing happened.  She opened her eyes.  Triggerhappy was hi=
t, and fell to his knees, mouth wide open, shocked, and in pain.  

       =
 "You....." Triggerhappy stopped to gasped for air, "Pile of......."

     =
   Triggerhappy fell down on his face, so he was laying on the ground.  Whe=
re his face was, a puddle of mechfluid appeared, and mechfluids started spi=
lling from where he had been hit.  The punctures in his metal started to tu=
rn into cracks, and mechfluid came out.

        Skullgrin, Jume, and Whee =
watched as Triggerhappy had been supposedly defeated.

        "NO!  MY DEC=
EPTIPAL!" Skullgrin shouted.

        Skullgrin transformed into Pretender =
mode, and had his massive, freaky club.  He ran at AzureBlade and threw a l=
ethal blow to AzureBlade's head.  Jume and Whee fired at AzureBlade.

     =
   "No!  Watch out!" Hell Drak yelled.

        A light came into her optic=
s, and then she quickly got up and dove at AzureBlade, trying to take him d=
own, but out of the way of damage...
        ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Surgit=
al suddenly felt something from Ice.  The mind thing.  Pain.  

        "No=
........not this.......I thought I had forgot about this!" Surgital said, b=
ut which Bodicon was saying it, nobody knew.

        Surgital didn't feel =
physical pain, but a flashback showed up, and would be visible in the minds=
 of both Ice and all the Bodicons.  It was a flashback from Decapitron!  

=
        Flashback:  Decapitron was tied to a conveyer belt, with some sort =
of energon rope.  He was horrified, and was screaming for help.  Then, he w=
ent forward, and a bunch of saws and stuff came down!  They started cutting=
 at Decapitron.  All he could do was scream in sheer pain.  Each saw blade =
had the Autobot symbol engraved on it.  Decapitron, still tied onto the con=
veyer belt, was now heading into a large box thing.  On the way, a heavy th=
ing with an Autobot symbol came down and sort of crushed Decapitron's head.=
  Then, Decapitron went into the box thing, which also had an Autobot symbo=
l, and then the doors of the box shut, and then Decapitron was stuck, and h=
e was getting beaten and battered.  After the 10 minute torture process was=
 done in the box, Decapitron kept going.  Mechfluid and oil and stuff were =
pouring like mad, and he was mangled and dislocated and stuff.  Finally, he=
 was at the end, and was dumped off of the conveyer belt and onto the groun=
d.  The last thing he had seen back then when that happened, was Autobots a=
round him, laughing sinisterly with evil eyes and faces.  
        *Flashba=
ck Ends*

        Surgital was still...
